sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-chart ref="horizontalChart" class="h-[14rem]" :option="barOptions"/>
</template>

<script>
import resizeChart from "@/mixins/resizeChart";
export default {
  name: "BarHorizontalChart",
  mixins: [ resizeChart ],
  data() {
    return {
      barOptions: {
        grid: {
          left: '0%',
          right: '2%',
          bottom: '2%',
          top: '20%',
          containLabel: true,
        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'shadow'
          }
        },
        legend: {
          show: false
        },
        xAxis: {
          type: 'value',
          boundaryGap: [0, 0.01],
          show: false,
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          data: ['2021', '2021', '2021', '2021', '2021'],
          axisTick: {
            alignWithLabel: true
          },
          axisLabel: {
            fontSize: 10
          }
        },
        series: [
          {
            showBackground: true,
            backgroundStyle: {
              color: '#ECECF4',
              borderRadius: [0, 3, 3 ,0]
            },
            itemStyle: {
              color: '#5B6270',
              barBorderRadius: [0, 3, 3, 0],
              borderWidth: 1,
              borderType: 'solid'
            },
            type: 'bar',
            data: [18203, 23489, 29034, 104970, 131744],
            markLine: {
              data: [{
                type: "average"
              }],
              lineStyle: {
                type: 'solid'
              },
              label: {
                show: true,
                position: 'end',
                formatter: '  ${c} \n Average'
              },
              symbol: "none"
            },
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.setRefElement('horizontalChart')
  }
}
</script>
